geodata-desc: Adds geographical coordinates storage and retrieval functionality
geodata-bad-input: Invalid arguments have been passed to the <nowiki>{{#coordinates:}}</nowiki> function
geodata-multiple-primary: <nowiki>{{#coordinates:}}</nowiki>: cannot have more than one primary tag per page
geodata-limit-exceeded: The limit of $1 <nowiki>{{#coordinates:}}</nowiki> {{PLURAL:$1|tag|tags}} per page has been exceeded
geodata-broken-tags-category-desc: The page has a malformed {{#coordinates:}} tag.
geodata-unknown-type-category: Pages with unknown type of coordinates
geodata-unknown-type-category-desc: The page uses an unknown value of the type parameter for coordinates.
geodata-unknown-globe-category-desc: The page uses an unknown value of the globe parameter for coordinates.
geodata-unknown-region-category-desc: The page uses an invalid value of the region parameter for coordinates.
geodata-api-help-coordinates-format: Format: Latitude and longitude separated by pipe ("|").
apihelp-query+coordinates-description: Returns coordinates of the given pages.
apihelp-query+coordinates-param-prop: Which additional coordinate properties to return.
apihelp-query+coordinates-param-primary: Whether to return only primary coordinates ("primary"), secondary ("secondary") or both ("all").
apihelp-query+coordinates-param-distance: Return distance in meters from the geographical coordinates of every valid result from the given coordinates.
Return distance in meters from the geographical coordinates of every valid result from the coordinates of this page.
apihelp-query+coordinates-example-1: Get a list of coordinates of the [[Main Page]]
apihelp-query+geosearch-description: Returns pages having coordinates that are located in a certain area.
apihelp-query+geosearch-param-bbox: Bounding box to search in: pipe (|) separated coordinates of top left and bottom right corners.
apihelp-query+geosearch-param-page: Title of page around which to search.
apihelp-query+geosearch-param-maxdim: Restrict search to objects no larger than this, in meters.
apihelp-query+geosearch-param-limit: Maximum number of pages to return.
apihelp-query+geosearch-param-prop: Which additional coordinate properties to return.
apihelp-query+geosearch-param-primary: Whether to return only primary coordinates ("primary"), secondary ("secondary") or both ("all").
apihelp-query+geosearch-param-debug: Whether debug information should be returned.
apihelp-query+geosearch-example-1: Search around the point with coordinates 37° 47′ 13.1″ N, 122° 23′ 58.84″ W
